phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
Connecting main power to all circuits.
Activation voltage is approaching critical level. 0.5, 0.2...
Begin the second phase of the activation system.
Begin the second phase of the activation system.
Power supplied to Brachial muscles in both arms.
All nerve links checking out normal.
Counting down to the absolute borderline.
Something is going wrong in the third stage!
Rejection occurring in the nerve center elements!
Break all circuits through number six!
Unit 00 has switched to standby power!
Thirty-five seconds until it comes to a complete stop.
The first test subject chosen by following the Marduk Report.
She is the designated pilot for Evangelion Unit 00.
All her personal records were erased.
So, what caused the accident during the last experiment?
However, we believe that mental instability
on the part of the pilot was a primary because.
Yes, her mind became much more disturbed than we had anticipated.
The demolition of block B-3 has been completed.
are to submit their data to the analysis group.
Everything except the core remains intact.
Thank you, this will help us a lot.
So, did you find anything new?
That is the code number for cannot be analyzed.
You mean, you do not know what this is?
We do know the Angel is composed of a type of matter
characterized by both particulate and wave properties, like light.
But you have at least found its power source, have not you?
But we have not been able to figure out any of its operating principles.
We have found something completely outside our experience.
The world is filled with mysteries.
For example, take a look at this.
This is the Angel's inherent wave pattern.
Although they are composed of a different form of matter,
their actual composition, in terms of the arrangement
and spacing of the pattern, falls within a 99.89 match of humans.
We must acknowledge our limited level of understanding once again.
We must acknowledge our limited level of understanding once again.
We must acknowledge our limited level of understanding once again.
How is the rest of it?
We cannot expect to use it as a reference.
Are you aware that when you say nothing that way,
it is the same as asking others to pay attention to you?
Well, it is just that my father seems to have burned his hands.
I was just wondering how it happened.
Do you know anything about those burns?
It was before you arrived at NERV.
Unit 00 went berserk during the activation experiments.
You have heard about that, right?
Ayanami was the pilot, was not she?
It was Commander Ikari who rescued her.
He opened the super-heated hatch with his bare hands.
That is how he burned his hands.
You have got to treat us to pizza if you lose!
Now, let us sink a shot!
Those guys are looking at us!
Those guys are looking at us!
Man, they have all got such incredible breasts.
What are you looking at so intently?
I think you are looking at Ayanami!
I told you, it is nothing like that.
Then, what were you looking at?
I was just wondering why she is always alone.
she has not had any friends since she started here in the 7th grade.
There is just something about her that makes her hard to talk to.
She is probably just got a lousy personality.
You are both Eva pilots, right?
You should know her better than us.
Well, I have hardly spoken to her.
Eva Unit 01 is now entering the third stage cooling process.
Lower all systems to Phase 3 in Cage 6.
The earlier harmonics and synchronization tests were good.
All numerical conditions have been satisfied.
Transmit the full range of the entry plug's personal data to Melchior.
Vent liquid wastes to the second purification system.
The protein walls are in good condition.
T-Minus 1,050 minutes until the Unit 00 re-activation experiment.
So you are still eating this instant stuff.
Look, you are a guest, so you have got no right to complain.
Here, put all of that into this!
Oh, do not you know how good this is?
Ordinary curry flavored instant ramen cannot compare to this!
The trick is to put less hot water in the soup.
Misato cooked this, did not she?
Misato cooked this, did not she?
How can she make something ready-to-eat taste so awful?
Next time, invite me when it is Shinji's turn to cook.
Shinji, you really ought to move.
You should not let one bad roommate ruin your life.
I am used to it now.
Never underestimate the ability of the human animal
And anyway, if he does move...
Shinji, why do not you bring me another one, please?
Shinji, why do not you bring me another one, please?
He is going to have to go through a lot of trouble and red tape.
He is going to have to go through a lot of trouble and red tape.
He just got his permanent security card, you know.
Shinji, would you do me a favor?
I keep forgetting to give this to her.
Would you mind delivering it before you go to headquarters?
You are staring at Rei's picture, are not you?
Oh, I think you are, Shinji.
You are embarrassed, are not you?
Well, you have got an official excuse to go to Rei's place now.
This is your chance, is not it?
I just find it strange that I know so little about Ayanami,
even though we are both Eva pilots.
She is a very nice girl, but she is like your father.
She is not very adept at...
Excuse me, it is Shinji Ikari.
I am coming in, Miss Ayanami!
So I was asked to deliver it.
I did not mean for any of this to happen.
Ritsuko said she forgot to give it to you.
I rang your bell, but there was no reply,
Central Dogma is currently open to the public.
Group 3 should proceed directly to the fourth gate.
Ritsuko asked me to deliver it to you.
Are not you going to have a re-activation experiment today?
Are not you afraid of piloting Unit 00?
I heard that you were hurt pretty badly in an earlier experiment,
so I thought you might be...
Are not you Commander Ikari's son?
Do not you have faith in your own father's work?
It was Commander Ikari who rescued her.
He opened the super-heated hatch with his bare hands.
That is how he burned his hands.
We will now commence the Unit 00 re-activation experiment.
Activation voltage has passed the critical point.
Central Nerve System elements are nominal.
It may be the fifth Angel.
You are not going to use Unit 00?
She is not ready to fight yet.
What is the status on Unit 01?
It will be ready in 380 seconds.
The target is passing over Tonosawa.
The target is now intruding into Lake Ashino airspace.
Eva Unit 01 is ready for launch.
We are detecting a high energy reaction from inside the target!
It is accelerating, and massing upon itself!
But the wound makes him babble.
Rei gives him the cold shoulder.
Will Shinji's hope and power from all over Japan be able to pierce through the Angel?
